pizzas.title: Margherita
pizzas.description: Pizza Margherita is a typical Neapolitan pizza, made with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella. Pizza Margherita is a typical Neapolitan pizza, made with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella. Pizza Margherita is a typical Neapolitan pizza, made with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella

pizzas.title: Marinara
pizzas.description: The traditional Marinara Pizza has tomatoes crushed, or blended, sliced fresh garlic, fresh oregano, extra virgin olive oil and maybe some sea salt to taste

pizzas.title: Capricciosa
pizzas.description: Classic Italian capricciosa pizza featuring ham, artichokes and mushrooms

pizzas.title: Quattro Formaggi
pizzas.description: Quattro formaggi is a variety of Italian pizza topped with a combination of four kinds of cheese, as the name suggests
